articles.author: Leslie Josephs
articles.title: Why flights to Europe are the cheapest they've been in years - CNBC
articles.description: Airlines have ramped up capacity between the U.S. and Europe in the wake of the Covid-19 pandemic.
articles.content:
Flights between the U.S. and Europe have not been this cheap in three years, when many countries were just lifting Covid-19 era rules.
Fares are low even for the traditionally slow late-fall and win… [+3320 chars]
